attributes.action: Introduce American Football teams to colleges and Schools throughout the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Most students at some point in school will be forced to play sports during classes such as P.E. Often the athletic students get chosen first, while the less athletic experience a form of discrimination. American Football is ah except of sports. Regardless of height, weight, abilities. There is a position for every child in American Football. Introducing the sport to Schools and Colleges throughout the UK would be brilliant for all students, teachers and parents.
attributes.background: American Football is the sport for team-building. Where regardless of physical characteristics. There is a spot for everyone on a American Football field. Too bond students and abolish the discrimination of less able kids in sports. Introduce American Football to schools & colleges across the UK.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because having a sports team would be a decision for individual schools and not the UK Government or Parliament. The National Curriculum does not require schools to teach specific sports. It leaves it up to schools.

You could start a new petition asking the Government to fund a campaign raising awareness of American Football in schools if that is something you would like to happen.
